description:
go.tools/ssa: added test of loading of partial programs (via gcimporter).

This exposed a bug: we weren't creating Functions for methods
of imported named types.

Also:
- simplification: 'candidate' no longer contains 'concrete *Function'.
  We look this up on demand.

NB: this CL contains a copy of CL 10935047 (use of typemap);
will submit/sync/resolve soon.

messages.text:
Hello gri@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.tools

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=ae745f0c1463&repo=tools ***

go.tools/ssa: added test of loading of partial programs (via gcimporter).

This exposed a bug: we weren't creating Functions for methods
of imported named types.

Also:
- simplification: 'candidate' no longer contains 'concrete *Function'.
  We look this up on demand.

NB: this CL contains a copy of CL 10935047 (use of typemap);
will submit/sync/resolve soon.

R=gri
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/11051043

subject: code review 11051043: go.tools/ssa: added test of loading of partial programs...
